      • calculateValue

        public boolean calculateValue()
        Description copied from class: Gate
        Calculated the output value of the gate from the input it receives.

        This function contains the logic of the Gate. It returns a boolean depending on the input values of the Gates in the inputGates list. calculateValue doesn't update the value of the gate, as this is handled elsewhere.

        Specified by:
        calculateValue in class Gate
        Returns:
        boolean The the output state of the gate.

      • setInputGate

        SignalGate doesn't take any inputs. Throws new GateException when called.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        gate - The gate to add as input.
